titleStmt.title: The dead mans real speech a funeral sermon preached on Hebr. xi. 4, upon the 29th day of April, 1672 : together with a brief of the life, dignities, benefactions, principal actions, and sufferings, and of the death of the said late Lord Bishop of Durham / published (upon earnest request) by Isaac Basire ...
titleStmt.author: Basier, Isaac, 1607-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for James Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with print show-through and some loss of print.
This item appears at reels 973:3 and 996:25. Copy at reel 973:3 lacks p. [1].
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
